name: Angry Girl
description:
An evil girl has acquired a firearm, and this means only one thing: all her enemies will be destroyed, she will find them all and revenge, stupid robots that settled in the endless fields, pesky Aztecs hiding in their temples and of course, the vampires who hid in the foot of the mountain, they will all know the wrath of this little but very angry girl.




Angry Girl - It is a two-dimensional shooter-platformer in which the player will shoot enemies in 30 different levels collected in the manual, each of which represents a real test for hardcore players.



Game features:
- Difficulty
- 30 Levels
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
